meanings.definition: A person who is sent on a religious mission.
meanings.sent1: The missioners traveled to a distant village to spread their faith.
meanings.sent2: The church sent a group of missioners to help the community in need.
meanings.sent3: The missioners decided to have a bake sale to raise funds for their journey.
meanings.sent4: The missioners were like beacons of hope in the dark world of despair.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the missioners' kindness lingered in the hearts of the villagers.

meanings.definition: The act of sending someone on a mission.
meanings.sent1: The missioners' departure was met with tears and prayers for their safety.
meanings.sent2: The missioners' mission was to bring aid to those affected by the disaster.
meanings.sent3: The missioners' boss jokingly said, 'Off you go, saving the world, one mission at a time!'
meanings.sent4: The missioners' journey symbolized the beginning of a new chapter for the community.
meanings.sent5: The missioners' task was clear: to bring hope to those who had lost it.
